name: android-kernel-builder
onCreateCommand: if [ -f .gitmodules ]; then git submodule update --init --recursive; fi && echo 'Submodules initialized.' && if [ -f KernelSU/kernel/requirements.txt ]; then pip3 install --user -r KernelSU/kernel/requirements.txt; fi && echo 'onCreateCommand finished.'

install.name: Verify Environment
install.command: echo 'Verifying environment...'; echo 'PATH is: $PATH'; clang --version; aarch64-linux-gnu-gcc --version; dtc --version; python3 --version

start.name: Idle
start.command: echo 'Android Kernel Build Agent Ready. Waiting for master prompt.'; sleep infinity
